::Stratus::

Stratus follows suit, peeling armor plating off of the shuttle.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
In the arctics, an asset to the Decepticons was waiting to be 
discovered.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> After seeing that the shuttles where almost worthless, Motormaster 
sighed.
> "Why do we have to get the useless ones," he mumbled to 
himself, "Okay
> boys, strip some of the metal armor off it, as much as you can, and
> somebody grab the blasters, we'll take em back to base, there may 
be a use
> for them" and at that, Motormaster plunged his arms into the steel 
hull of
> the shuttle, and grunted as he tried to tear off a plank of armor.
